data.text: @raft78 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@jasonhodges4661 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. .
@chitwanarora6 We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@AroraAr56872367 Hello, we understand that you've already submitted your refund request. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process a large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@Flaaalaaa We suggest you get the link https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn to request a travel voucher or extend ticket validity to your ticket.
@Flaaalaaa May we ask for the travel date of your flight?
@STKAM We are sorry for the inconvenience. If you have sent your request to our related department, please wait for the reply from them. They will contact you as soon as they can.
@Jeet95799536 We will notify you as soon as there are updates.
@elbfeuereins We understand that you've already sent your issue. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process a large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@Flaaalaaa Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Jeet95799536 Please wait for the official announcement.
@Kanthidajasmine Hello. We would like to suggest that you send an email to our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.
@CodmanAlan We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

data.text: @alexphototweets Greetings, we will contact you via DM for more information.
@CodmanAlan  We invite you to please send us a private message so we can better advise.
@dominiquebkk You are most welcome. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions.

@dominiquebkk The office is closed. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com for further information and assistance.
@Ridwan_Sadi As our THAI office has a large number of contacts. We suggest that you contact them again later or contact them by email, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@Ridwan_Sadi In this case, you can choose the option that we offer. You can do that and read for more information at https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn
@jodymedland We suggest that you follow our announcements again. If any update, we will announce that as soon as possible.

@1961andallthat We're sorry for the inconvenience, Steve. Please note that it may take longer than usual to process your refund due to the COVID outbreak. We humbly suggest you follow up on your concern through Email. Rest assured that they'll be in touch once they are able to.
